title: TOMA 6 (Tikal)
description:
I get meta in this one—reading a paper I wrote 20 years ago about a near-death experience that happened to me 25 years ago. Damn, I'm getting old!



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
dc:creator: Chris Ryan
itunes:author: Chris Ryan
itunes:subtitle: Stung by a scorpion, now what?
